meta.name: Trackside 2
meta.description: Trackside 2 is New Zealandâ€™s companion channel to Trackside 1, providing additional live coverage of horse racing, harness racing, and greyhound events. With a focus on delivering continuous race broadcasts, replays, and expert analysis, Trackside 2 ensures that fans never miss a race. The channel offers a dynamic viewing experience for racing enthusiasts, featuring key events from both local and international racing scenes, as well as special programming focused on the sport.
